hooks.command: command -v yammm-lsp >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo 'Warning: yammm-lsp binary not found in PATH. LSP features (diagnostics, completion, hover) will not work. Install the VS Code extension (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=simon-lentz.yammm) which bundles the binary, or build from source: git clone https://github.com/simon-lentz/yammm.git && cd yammm && make build-lsp'
